name: Guns and Ammo
longDesc: There is a smell of gunpowder in the air.  You are in the gun and ammo room.  There, in the corner of the room, is a loaded gun in a locked gun cabinet.
shortDesc: In the corner of the room, is a loaded gun in a locked gun cabinet.
feat1desc: locked gun cabinet containing a loaded gun
feat1interactSuccess: Congratulation, you now have a loaded gun
feat1interactComplete: the cabinet is empty and the gun is gone
feat1interactFail: the gun is still in the cabinet
